question: A Museum Near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntary / unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary / unpaid work at the museum.Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntary / unpaid work.In your letter- explain why you want to do voluntary / unpaid work at the museum- describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful- give details of when you would be available for work
text: I am writing this with regards to the vacancy advertisement "voluntary/unpaid", which I read in the Sunday Times on 24th September 2022.  I would like to apply for the position.

To begin with, I have been studying  history for almost ten years now. I find this opportunity useful and interesting in developing my carrier. I have a master's degree in ancient civilizations from Oxford university. In addition, I have done research about aboriginals in South Africa. So, I hope I would be an ideal candidate for  volunteer. And all in all, history is my passion.
Moreover, I have mastered pottery and as well as crafting. Those were my hobbies since my childhood. I hope these skills will definitely help me in my time as a volunteer.
I can join upon request because I just return after finishing the training on inventory control management. Apparently, I am unemployed at the moment.
I look forward to hearing from you. I you need more information please feel free to contact me on my mobile.
